There are several tools for identifying neurocognitive disorders. They are not sufficient on their own to make a diagnosis. They can be used to assess the severity of cognitive impairment.

* Mini Mental State Evaluation: global cognitive assessment
*Dubois 5-word test: memory and encoding assessment
*BREF: assessment of executive functions
*Clock: assessment of executive and visuospatial functions

question.title: What is a common tool used to assess the severity of cognitive impairment in neurocognitive disorders?

option_a.title: BREF
option_a.description: A tool used to assess executive functions

option_b.title: Dubois 5-word test
option_b.description: A tool used to assess memory and encoding

option_c.title: Clock
option_c.description: A tool used to assess executive and visuospatial functions

option_d.title: Mini Mental State Evaluation
option_d.description: A global cognitive assessment tool, but not specifically used to assess severity of cognitive impairment
